title: Fallen Embers
description: Who could have foreseen he would ever encounter the one who would change his life forever?But He Does.How much of a man's world, how much of his life will he risk to possess everything he has ever wanted?From the creator of the beloved World of Alterra comes a tale of passion and determination, of sacrifice and courage. Rain has found a foe he cannot overcome with sword or strategy.Now he must battle an enemy none can defeat. Now he will battle Fate itself.
author: C.S. Marks
